config.Color.name: Color
config.Color.description: Set your iridium color palette. Check examples.png in the mod folder for options and examples! Set to 'off' to keep vanilla sprites.
config.Desaturate All.name: Desaturate All
config.Desaturate All.description: Global Toggle to desaturate colors of all iridium things at once.
config.Desaturate Tools.name: Desaturate Tools
config.Desaturate Tools.description: Whether or not tools are desaturated. Set to true by default to match vanilla iridium color schemes.
config.Desaturate Weapons.name: Desaturate Weapons
config.Desaturate Weapons.description: Whether or not weapons are desaturated. Set to true by default to match vanilla iridium color schemes.
config.Desaturate Machines.name: Desaturate Machines
config.Desaturate Machines.description: Whether or not machines are desaturated. Set to true by default to match vanilla iridium color schemes.
config.Desaturate Slime Hutch.name: Desaturate Slime Hutch
config.Desaturate Slime Hutch.descriptio: Whether or not the slime hutch is desaturated. Set to true by default to match vanilla iridium color schemes.
config.Reskin Slime Hutch.name: Reskin Slime Hutch
config.Reskin Slime Hutch.description: Turns on and off the option to use the slime hutch reskin. Set this to 'false' if you want to use another slime hutch retexture mod.
config.Reskin Slime Machines.name: Reskin Slime Machines
config.Reskin Slime Machines.description: Allows recoloring the Slime Incubator and Slime Egg Press.
config.Stardrop Shape.name: Stardrop Shape
config.Stardrop Shape.description: Set this to 'new' to give the stardrop a more star-like shape, or 'classic' to keep it as it is.
config.Change Stardrop Color.name: Change Stardrop Color
config.Change Stardrop Color.description: Whether stardrops should change to match the iridium color.
config.Enable Animations.name: Enable Animations
config.Enable Animations.description: Animates some items like iridium ore, iridium bar, iridium ore nodes, and meteors.
config.Recolor Pets.name: Recolor Pets
config.Recolor Pets.description: Enable recoloring the purple turtle and (with Iridium Cat and Dog installed) the purple cat and dog.
config.Recolor Tools.name: Recolor Tools
config.Recolor Weapons.name: Recolor Weapons
config.Recolor Shoes.name: Recolor Shoes
config.Recolor Shoes.description: Allow recoloring Iridium and Dragonscale Boots.
config.Recolor Sprinkler.name: Recolor Sprinkler
config.Coordinated Crafting Bars.name: Coordinated Crafting Bars
config.Coordinated Crafting Bars.descrip: Changes the shape of the iridium bar, refined quartz, and radioactive bars to match other ore bars.
config.Iridium Pail and Shears.name: Iridium Pail and Shears
config.Iridium Pail and Shears.descripti: Retexture the milk pail and shears to match your iridium tools.
